F354 VINDICATION CRITICAL

Formal Epilepsy Diagnosis

Status: VERIFIED
Date: 2024-12-10
Found: 2026-01-14

Summary

Dr Karunaratne formally diagnosed: 'Epilepsy with generalised seizures.' Not functional/dissociative seizures.

Legal Significance

VALIDATES CAUSATION - The December 2021 seizure was epileptic, not dissociative. Causally linked to abrupt pregabalin cessation.
